language.title: Preferred Language
language.description: Language Cline will use for communication.

telemetry.tooltip: This setting is managed by your organization's remote config
telemetry.description: Help improve Cline by sending usage data and error reports. Never sends code, prompts, or personal private information. See our {telemetryLink} and {privacyLink}.

apiProvider.label: API Provider
apiProvider.remoteConfigTooltip: Provider options are managed by your organization's remote config

subagents.title: Subagents
subagents.cliRequired: Subagents require Cline CLI. Install via:
subagents.authDescription: to authenticate with Cline or configure API providers.
subagents.description: Allow Cline to spawn subprocesses to handle focused tasks, like exploring large codebases, keeping your main context clean.

checkpoints.title: Enable Checkpoints
checkpoints.description: Enable the extension to save workspace checkpoints during tasks. Underlying uses git, may not work well for large workspaces.

mcpDisplay.title: MCP Display Mode
mcpDisplay.description: Controls how MCP responses are shown: plain text, rich format with links/images, or rendered markdown.

openaiReasoning.title: OpenAI Reasoning Effort
openaiReasoning.description: Reasoning effort for OpenAI family models (for all OpenAI model providers)

strictPlanMode.title: Enable Strict Plan Mode
strictPlanMode.description: Enforces strict tool usage in plan mode, preventing file edits.

focusChain.title: Enable Focus Chain
focusChain.description: Enable enhanced task progress tracking and automatic focus chain list management during tasks.
focusChain.reminderDescription: Interval (in number of messages, 1-100) to remind Cline of its focus chain checklist. Lower values provide more frequent reminders.

dictation.title: Enable Dictation
dictation.description: Enable speech-to-text transcription using your Cline account. Uses the Avalon model from Aqua Voice, billed at $0.0065 credits per minute of processed audio. Up to 5 minutes per message.

autoCompact.title: Enable Auto-Compact
autoCompact.description: Enable the advanced context management system which uses LLM-based compression for next-generation models.

webTools.title: Enable Cline Web Tools
webTools.description: Enable web search and web fetch tools when using a Cline provider.

nativeToolCall.title: Enable Native Tool Calling
nativeToolCall.description: Use the model's native tool calling API instead of XML-based tool parsing. This improves performance for supported models.

parallelToolCalling.title: Enable Parallel Tool Calling
parallelToolCalling.description: Allow models to call multiple tools in a single response. Enabled automatically for GPT-5 models.

backgroundEdit.title: Enable Background Edit
backgroundEdit.description: Allow file edits in the background without opening a diff view in the editor.

multiRootWorkspace.title: Enable Multi-Root Workspace
multiRootWorkspace.description: Allow Cline to work across multiple workspaces.

hooks.title: Enable Hooks
hooks.windowsWarning: Hooks not yet supported on Windows. This feature is currently only available on macOS and Linux.
hooks.description: Allow execution of hooks from the .clinerules/hooks/ directory.

skills.title: Enable Skills
skills.description: Enable reusable, on-demand agent instruction skills from the .cline/skills/ directory.

yoloMode.title: Enable YOLO Mode
yoloMode.remoteConfigTooltip: This setting is managed by your organization's remote config
yoloMode.warning: Experimental & Dangerous: This mode disables safety checks and user confirmations. Cline will auto-approve all actions without asking. Use with extreme caution.

settings.defaultTerminalProfileDescription: Select the default terminal Cline will use. 'Default' uses your VSCode global setting.
settings.shellIntegrationTimeoutDescription: Set how long Cline will wait for shell integration to activate before executing a command. Increase if experiencing terminal connection timeouts.
settings.aggressiveTerminalReuseDescription: When enabled, Cline will reuse existing terminal windows not in the current working directory. Disable if experiencing task lockups after terminal commands.
settings.terminalExecutionModeDescription: Choose whether Cline runs commands in VS Code terminals or background processes.

browserSession.clineWantsToUseBrowser: Cline wants to use the browser:

chatRow.executeCommand: Cline wants to execute this command:
chatRow.commandRequiresApproval: Model determined this command requires explicit approval.
chatRow.shellIntegrationDescription: Cline may not see command outputs. Please update VSCode ({updateLink}) and ensure you're using a supported shell: zsh, bash, fish, or PowerShell ({selectProfileLink}). {troubleshootLink}
chatRow.autoRetryFailedDescription: Failed after {maxAttempts} auto-retry attempts. Manual intervention required.
chatRow.startNewTask: Cline wants to start a new task:
chatRow.createGithubIssue: Cline wants to create a GitHub issue:
chatRow.useSubagent: Cline wants to use a subagent:
chatRow.shellIntegrationRecommendation: Since you're experiencing repeated shell integration issues, we recommend switching to background terminal mode for improved reliability.
chatRow.newTask: Cline wants to start a new task:
chatRow.reportBug: Cline wants to create a GitHub issue:

hook.title: Hook:
hook.timeoutMessage: Took longer than 30 seconds. Check for infinite loops or add timeouts for network requests.
hook.validationMessage: Hook returned invalid JSON. Please see error details below for more info.

contextWindow.compactTaskQuestion: Compact this task to reduce context window usage?
contextWindow.thresholdDescription1: Click the context window bar to set a new threshold.
contextWindow.thresholdDescription2: When context window usage exceeds this threshold, the task will be condensed automatically.

focusChain.newStepsMessage: Continuing the task will generate new steps
focusChain.clickToEditTitle: Click to edit the todo list in file

stickyUserMessage.clickToScroll: Click to scroll to your message

welcome.title: Welcome to Cline
welcome.subtitle: Your AI Programming Assistant

description.part1: Unlock the intelligent coding capabilities of
description.part2: along with access to tools that let me complete all sorts of tasks, including creating and editing files, exploring complex projects, using a browser, and executing terminal commands
description.part3: I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my abilities.

welcome.signupPrompt: Sign up for an account to get started free, or use an API key with access to models like Claude Sonnet.

homeHeader.title: What can I do for you?
homeHeader.tooltip: I can progressively develop software by editing files, exploring projects, running commands, and using a browser. I can even use MCP tools to extend beyond basic code completion to help.

nextjsNotetakingApp.title: Build a Next.js App
nextjsNotetakingApp.description: Create a beautiful note-taking app with Next.js and Tailwind

terminalCliTool.title: Make a CLI Tool
terminalCliTool.description: Develop a powerful terminal CLI to automate cool tasks

snakeGame.title: Develop a Game
snakeGame.description: Code a classic snake game that runs in the browser

tooltips.lockedOrganization: Cannot be changed while your organization has remote config enabled.

welcome.description: Sign up for a free Cline account to get started with an AI programming assistant.
welcome.termsAndPrivacy: By signing up you agree to our {termsLink} and {privacyLink}.

marketplace.organizationPreconfigured: Your organization has preconfigured some MCP servers available

server.organizationEnabled: This server cannot be disabled because your organization has enabled it

addServer.title: Add a remote MCP server by providing a name and its URL endpoint. Learn more

configureServers.description: The Model Context Protocol enables communication with locally running MCP servers that provide additional tools and resources to extend Cline's capabilities. You can use community-made servers or ask Cline to create new tools specialized for your workflows (e.g., "Add a tool to fetch the latest npm docs").
configureServers.organizationManagesServers: Your organization manages some MCP servers

thinking.label: Reasoning ({tokens} tokens)
thinking.notSupported: Reasoning not supported for this model
thinking.disabled: Enable extended reasoning for enhanced reasoning

splitMode.tooltip: Use different models for Plan mode vs Act mode

chatTextArea.placeholderHint: Type @ to add context, / for slash commands & workflows, shift+drag to drop files/images

modeToggle.plan: In Plan mode, Cline will gather info to build a plan
modeToggle.act: In Act mode, Cline will complete tasks immediately

windowsPowershell.message: Looks like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

errorRow.diffError: The search pattern used by the model didn't match anything in the file. Retrying...

settings.disableToolUseDescription: Prevent Cline from using browser actions (e.g., launch, click, type).
settings.viewportSizeDescription: Set the size of the browser viewport, used for screenshots and interaction.
settings.customBrowserArgsDescription: Space-separated arguments passed to the browser executable.
settings.enableClineToUseChrome: Enable Cline to use your Chrome
settings.specifyCustomPath: You can specify a custom path below.
settings.remoteConnectionRequiresDebugMode: Using remote browser connection requires launching Chrome in debug mode
settings.manuallyOrUsingButton: Manually (--remote-debugging-port=9222) or using the button below. Enter a host address or leave blank for auto-discovery.

modal.description: Let Cline execute these actions without asking for approval

clineRules.title: Manage Cline Rules & Workflows

descriptions.rules: Rules let you give Cline system-level guidance. Think of it as a persistent way to include context and preferences for your project or globally per conversation.
descriptions.workflows: Workflows let you define a sequence of steps to guide Cline through a sequence of repeatable tasks, like deploying a service or committing a PR. To invoke a workflow in chat, type /workflow-name.
descriptions.skills: Skills are reusable sets of instructions Cline can activate on demand. When a task matches a skill's description, Cline uses the use_skill tool to load the full instructions.
descriptions.hooks: Hooks allow you to execute custom scripts at specific points in Cline's execution lifecycle, enabling automation and integration with external tools.

clineRules.windowsWarning: Hooks toggling is not supported on Windows. Hooks can be created, edited, and deleted, but not enabled/disabled and will not execute.

hookRow.windowsToggleTooltip: Hook toggling not supported on Windows. Hooks can be edited and deleted but will not execute.

onboarding.changeLaterInSettings: You can change this later in Settings

openRouter.modelInfoDependsOnPreset: Model info and pricing will depend on your preset configuration.

checkpointControls.restoreTaskAndWorkspaceDescription: Restore task and project files to snapshot taken at this point
checkpointControls.restoreTaskOnlyDescription: Delete messages after this point (does not affect workspace)
checkpointControls.restoreWorkspaceOnlyDescription: Restore project files to snapshot taken at this point (task may get out of sync)
checkpointControls.restoreFilesDescription: Restore project files to snapshot taken at this point (use 'Compare' to see what would be restored)
checkpointControls.restoreTaskOnlyDescriptionFiles: Delete messages after this point (does not affect workspace files)
checkpointControls.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restore project files and delete all messages after this point

skills.title: Skills:
skills.description: Extend Parrot's abilities with specialized sets of instructions.

webSearch.title: Web Search:
webSearch.description: Improved web search tool within Parrot providers.

telemetryBanner.title: Help Improve Cline
telemetryBanner.description: Cline collects errors and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. Never sends code, prompts, or personal private information.
telemetryBanner.turnOffSetting: You can turn this off in

debugSection.resetStateDescription: This will reset all global state and secret storage in the extension.

ruleRow.agentsTooltip: When a top-level AGENTS.md file exists, recursively searches all AGENTS.md files in the workspace
ruleRow.ruleRequiredCannotDisable: This rule is required and cannot be disabled

newRuleRow.hookSelectDescription: Select the type of hook to create. Hooks execute at specific points in Cline's lifecycle. Available: {{availableHooks}}
newRuleRow.skillNameValidationError: Skill name can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores
newRuleRow.fileExtensionValidationError: Only .md, .txt, or no file extension allowed
